content: My name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Mister Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center of München.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price during the conversation.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide an exact number. The conversation suggests that Peter Schmidt is aiming for the highest price possible, and Yi-Nuo Wang is looking for the best deal. They have not reached a consensus on the price as of the end of the conversation.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikely and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal experiences or opinions. However, based on the conversation provided, it seems that the negotiation was focused and direct, with both parties expressing their intentions clearly. The lack of a final agreement could indicate that the negotiation was more centered around the price, rather than personal interactions. Therefore, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as a neutral 5, indicating that there was no significant indication of likeability or dislikeability in the conversation.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. The conversation remained professional and focused on the rental price of the apartment. There were no personal insults or discriminatory remarks made by either party.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: As mentioned, I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation. If such an incident had occurred, I would have provided the reason here. Since there was no such incident, I am unable to provide a specific reason.
name: Yi-Nuo
